suggestions.original: To enhance the line texture in the artwork, consider adding more detailed line work to the human figures. This could include defining facial features, clothing details, and adding shading to create depth. Additionally, varying the thickness and style of lines in different elements, such as the dragons and birds, can further enhance the vibrancy and dynamism of the piece. Experimenting with cross-hatching or stippling techniques in certain areas might also add more texture and interest.
